resources.string:
You will have 5 minutes to show what you know. 

Each question can be attempted only one time.

After selecting an Answer, you will be given an opportunity confirm your answer before moving to the next question

The game will end when either all of the questions have been submitted, or when time runs out

Questions not submitted will be marked incorrect.

The player with the highest score will be declared the winner

 Press continue when you are ready to begin

 Good Luck !!!
